name: Filipinas
startIntroPart1: Hail his Most Catholic Majesty Felipe I of the Philippines! Your realm was founded in your name by Miguel Lopez de Legaspi in 1565. As such, the feuding rulers in your Asian realm have been united in your name. It is high time to make your kingdom great, your Most Catholic Majesty!
startIntroPart2: Your Most Catholic Majesty, the peoples of the Philippines are asking you to help lead the kingdom to victory against all those who oppose it! Will you uphold the realm and the faith in Asia? Can you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: You threaten my realm? This means war!
attacked: Submit and there will be peace. Refuse and you'll be defeated!
defeated: The kingdom has fallen. Pray for us all.
introduction: Hello. My name is Felipe I, king of the East Indies.
uniques: Units pay only 1 movement point to embark and disembark
Units fight as though they were at full strength even when damaged
cities: Villa de San Miguel de Cebu
